bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Carlos E. Finlay, February 3, 1942

div1.p: Hench thanks Carlos E. Finlay for information concerning his father's work. He intends to study more about Carlos J. Finlay before publishing his monograph.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Carlos E. Finlay, February 3, 1942
div1.opener:
February 3, 1942
Dr. C. E. Finlay
Linea Numero 710
Vedado, Habana
Cuba
My dear Doctor Finlay:
div1.p:
I wish to thank you for your further
information regarding your father's cases. I certainly
appreciate any information you can give me. My mind is
entirely open and I certainly will make a much more
thorough study of your father's work before publishing
my monograph.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
